Finding aid updated by Diana Bowers-Smith
Brooklyn Historical Society
Helen Rodzevich school ephemera collection
Rodzevich, Helen
2000.006
0.01 Linear Feet in one folder.
1944-1947 Junior high school and high school programs, certificates, graduation commencement exercises, and congratulatory cards belonging to Brooklyn resident Helen Rodzevich. A0143
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Gift of Clark S. Marlor, 2000.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date (if known); Helen Rodzevich school ephemera collection, 2000.006, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.
Conditions Governing Access
Open to users without restriction.
Conditions Governing Use
While many items at the Center for Brooklyn History are unrestricted, we do not own reproduction rights to all materials. Be aware of the several kinds of rights that might apply: copyright, licensing and trademarks. The borrower assumes all responsibility for copyright questions.
